review: Why would a person spend extra for a smart TV, The Amazon Stick is wonderful, I love it.
author: dorothy bryant

review: Wish I could make it work in hotels! Other than that I love it!
author: Brian D. Goad "Brian"

review: It worked fine.  There is more selection than I was expecting.
author: Ron Moutray

review: I love this product. It is fast and always on unlike my blue-ray player where it takes a few mins to get on to netflix or amazon prime.The problem I have is, when this is connected to HDMI port on TV it interferes with programs I get on air using TV antenna. So when I  want to watch TV programs, I have unplug this from TV. I don't know if I am the only one with this problem!
author: Shyam Kumar

review: i even ordered a replacement and it still constantly buffers. nothing else I own buffers this bad, even my old vizio smart tv. maybe Its a router settings issue.
author: Adam Yeager

review: Buy it! It is easy and convenient and you can do so much with it.
author: Rie
